content: Proficient in building dynamic, responsive user interfaces using React and Next.js. Expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, and integrating with backend services. Skilled in both functional and object-oriented programming paradigms.

Experienced in designing and implementing scalable backend systems using the MERN stack. Proficient in database management with MongoDB and API development using Express.js and Node.js. Skilled in both functional and object-oriented programming across multiple languages.
